TopicTitle: Matching Center a mass and Center of lift

Articles.Content:
I find the the build in support for checking CoM en CoL lacking. sinse it it is hard to see wheter of not they match exactly. This is especialy important with assemetrical designs

Question, are there any tools that allow me to exactly show (in mm) how much my center of lift and center of mass are located from each other in 3 dimentions).

Edited October 27, 2014 by FreeThinker
